articles.author: Chris Trapasso
articles.title: NFL Draft 2019 superlatives: The immediate force, the breakout late-round receiver and more prospect awards
articles.description: Who'll live up to the hype like Quenton Nelson? Which late-round receiver could be the next Antonio Brown?
articles.content:
